chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 has the above problem:
Dear ladies and gentlemen! 
Now I'm really fed up. The package did not arrive at my place nor was it left at the UPS location mentioned by you and UPS because it no longer exists. * There is no longer a UPS drop-off point or kiosk * in Schierholzstraße 69, 30655.
I am terminating my contract here and now. That's it!!!!!!
Petra Kienlin
Thank you very much for your help,

Dear ecomobile

the customer has not found the collection point and no longer wants the parcel. please forward the parcel back to you. 


Regards,
Hamza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD. If the customer wishes to contest, kindly send us the necessary documents. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

This order will be refunded in 24 hours 

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Feyza - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us with the relevant documents. We will continue our investigation with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY
